## generate istanbul extradata

```
# obtain account from nodekey
$> NODEKEY="0x1be3b50b31734be48452c29d714941ba165ef0cbf3ccea8ca16c45e3d8d45fb0"
$> node privateKeyToAccount.js $NODEKEY

# create extradata
$> istanbul extra encode --config istanbul-validator-config-example.toml

# decode extradata
$> istanbul extra decode --extradata ""
```
